paragraph.paragraph: EiffelStore provides facilities for interfacing an application with various DataBase Management Systems (DBMS). It contains a powerful set of classes grouped into layers representing different levels of abstraction.
paragraph.heading: 2Layers Organization

list.item:
The
content/10_interface_layer/index.xml interface layer provides a high-level, unique interface for every DBMS.

The
content/20_implementation_layer/index.xml implementation layer customizes high-level routines to various DBMS handles.
